title: Unable to Connect to chat.
body:
So over the last day I havn't been able to connect to chat and I don't really know why.

I can talk to team mates and everything in game but outside the game I can't talk to friends or join chat lobbies.

replies.body:
The chat server and in-game chat function are two different things. Chat will work in game because it uses the same communication as you moving your champion around. Chat in client uses another server altogether, so it's possible that you're failing to connect to one but not the other.

What OS are you using and who's your ISP?
